summary: Comprehensive test suite for Amazon SNS functionality using Moto to mock AWS services. It exercises topic management, subscriptions, publishing (including batch and FIFO), platform applications, HTTP notification verification, CloudFormation integration, server behavior, and filter policy utilities.
business_intent: Ensure the SNS client implementation works correctly across diverse use cases, handling messages, attributes, policies, and error conditions reliably, thereby preventing regressions in production deployments.
